summary: Both REQ-1 and REQ-2 are implemented in ProductShowcase.tsx. The third product card now uses the cricket bat image path and the fourth card's price is set to â‚¹999. missing_requirements.requirement: The cricket bat image file must exist at frontend/public/assets/generated/cricket-bat.dim_400x400.png.
